titleStmt.title: A true narrative of the horrid hellish popish-plot To the tune of Packington's Pound, the first part.
A true narrative of the horrid hellish popish-plot. Part 1.
titleStmt.author: Gadbury, John, 1627-1704.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Good people I pray you give hear unto me,".
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
